duties_responsibilities.duty: Managing quality score deliverables to identify trends, patterns, and areas for improvement.
Documenting supporting sources & evidentiary findings to support data quality.
Coordinating peer-to-peer coaching to enhance quality scores.
Performing & assigning tasks inside of Pipefy to ensure timely completion & team stays on task.
Contribute to a high-level performing team to achieve & deliver product SLA’s and expectations.
Responsible for collating, analyzing, and validating data to ensure standards for product quality are met.
Implement data quality best practices and maintain a high standard of data excellence.
Perform cleansing activities to identify and resolve data anomalies, inconsistencies, and errors.
Conduct regular audits of data sources to ensure quality standards are being met.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define data quality requirements for new data sources and contribute to the implementation of data quality score.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Quality Management, Statistics, or a related field (Master's preferred).
